title: @Riot Aurelion Sol Is God?!
body:
So while watching the preview for the new champ, i noticed little things that lead me to this hypothesis. When he says "some kneel down in worship and others hide behind castle walls." i thought of how there are people who worship god and people believe that kings and queens are all that but are really just regular pawns hiding within there castle's. He is also a Celestial Being and within the video when they show him it appears as if he him self is made of a galaxy / condensed stars while creating a sun in his hand. and if he has the power to create a sun then does he have the power to create his own galaxy's and/or universe, planets, life excreta? also the wiki he is called *The Star Forger/Cosmic Overlord! A god wouldn't be far fetched from league of legends when we already have 4 demi gods maybe more. {{champion:75}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:101}} I don't know If anyone has more info pleas let me know! This new champ has really intrigued me! <3 XD

                                                                                                                                    sincerely: SoulEaterThresh
